data: // (important) tag is used to auto-open the mail
// (important) tag is used to auto-open the mail

Dear customer,^^Congratulations on your subscription to MAILCO and your ownership of a brand-new mailbox.^^You can now receive letters through the mailboxes in your town, and even craft your own!^^-MAILCO: "It's good to get mail!"

Hi sweetheart!^^Your dad thinks I'm silly for writing a letter so soon after you left, but... I had a horrible dream that you broke your broom. I would never forgive myself if anything happened to you!^^I'm sure you're fine... but I left you a crafting recipe for a balloon, in case you're not. And don't be afraid to build bridges if flying is too scary. When your dad was a new Alchemist, he ONLY used bridges to get between islands!^^I hope you're doing alright, sweetie.^^Love, Mom xxxxxxxxx

A LETTER FROM THE ALCHEMIST'S GUILD^^Congratulations on your first day as a new Alchemist!^^Please remember that you are now a representative of the Alchemist's Guild.^^The following misdeeds will lead to disciplinary action or expulsion from the Guild:^- Giving flying equipment to untrained citizens^- Throwing Spirits off islands^- Eating Spirits^- Forming an army of Spirits to overthrow a government^^Good luck with your year of training!

[color=green]OSSONO'S NEWSLETTER FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NEW IN TOWN, ISSUE 1[/color]^^Hello! Ossono here. Welcome to Moonstone Island!^^This is a newsletter that automatically goes out to everyone who moves here - like you!^^Step one of settling in: Get to know your new neighbours! Some people might even have jobs for you (which is great because then you can get money to spend at the tavern).^^That's all for Issue 1 of Ossono's Newsletter! Stay tuned for more!^xoxo Ossono
Hey!^^Don't forget - we are celebrating the New Year festival tomorrow at 20:00 in the mountain cave at the top of the island!^^There will be fireworks!!!^^Zed

[color=purple]HELLO ALKEMIST!!!^^IT'S ME FERRA^^OSSONO IS MAKING ME USE THE MAIL SERVIS^^ANYWAY YOU SHOULD COME TO THE FORGE AND BRING ME 10 COPPER ORE!!!!^^I CAN TEACH YOU A COOL RESSIPE IF YOU DO OK? YOU CAN GET COPPER ORE IN MINES JUST BREAK OPEN THE ROCKS^^MAN LETTERS ARE SO SLOW TO RITE^^OH BY THE WAY ITS FERRA[/color]

WOWWWW IT'S ALREADY THE NEW YEAR? Sounds like a good time to MAKE EXPLOOOOSHUNS HAPEN!!!! Come to the mountain cave tomorro at 20:00 sharp if you wanna see things exeplode (in the form of firewerks)^^Lots of love FERRA

[color=green]OSSONO'S NEWSLETTER FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NEW IN TOWN, ISSUE 2[/color]^^Hello again!^^This is a public service announcement that every Friday is Happy Hour at the tavern. All drinks are half price!!^^Also Ofelia tells me that I have to put a disclaimer here that I "technically" own the tavern. I don't understand why it matters if I'm offering you cheap drinks but I don't want to get in trouble with Ofelia so this is a disclaimer ok? Ok.^xoxo Ossono
Rowan's General Store is open!^^Come say hi and check out our range of farming goods!^^Rowan

[color=green]OSSONO'S NEWSLETTER FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NEW IN TOWN, ISSUE 3[/color]^^Hello! Ossono again!^^Do you love danger? Do you live for adventure? Why not check out... THE DUNGEON!^^It's next to the hot spring (and you should also check out the hot spring) in the north-east of town.^^Rumour has it that there might even be TREASURE inside the dungeon, so if you find any, make sure to kick back a little to your friendly neighbourhood tip-giver (me).^xoxo Ossono

Hey I'm not sure if I've told you this but I put a Community Chest in my shop! People put things they don't need in there from time to time so you should pop by sometimes and see if there's anything in there you might put to use!

Hi this is Ossono^^I heard you talked to everyone in town!^^GOOD JOB!^^if you're wondering why I'm writing to you and not just saying this in person, it's because I think the mail service is really important and we don't use it enough!!!^^ok bye xoxo

Hi kid,^Your mother and I completely forgot to tell you about Moonstones! You'll need to find them for alchemist recipes, and they're easy to spot, because they glow at night.^They are terribly rare, though - only one Moonstone appears on each island.^^Your mother wants to add that you should eat your vegetables and go to bed at a sensible time.^^-Dad
Hello, Alchemist!^^Come visit me at the Science Center! I have science things to show you!^^Professor

Hello sweetheart!^^It's been almost an entire season that you've been gone. How is island life? Is your Spirit thriving?^^Just to update you, we've booked a little city break in a week. We're going to take pottery classes!^^The house is so quiet without you here! We miss you!!^^-Love, Mom & Dad
DO YOU LOVE FISHING?^^Come to Tobin's Fishing Shop on Moonstone Beach for all your fishing needs!

Hello, Alchemist! Rowan here (I run the General Store, in case you forgot who I was, haha!)^^I have a favour to ask you. I've been inspired by the way you live in harmony with Spirits, just like in the early days of the Old Kingdom. I think we should all follow your example, so I'd like you to help me pair people up with a Spirit companion!^^Just make sure to check your mail, okay? Everyone's going to take it in turns to ask you for their Spirit match! You should be getting your first letter really soon :)^^Thank you!
Wood you like some new furniture?^^Why not tree-t yourself to a hand-carved chair or a table?^^Come see Paolo, Moonstone's best (and only) carpenter!

ALCHEMIST! IT'S ZED! SOMETHING INCREDIBLE TURNED UP IN MY RESEARCH!^^Oh, sorry, I had my fountain pen on caps lock. Cleo and I just unearthed some ancient texts that speak about a Great Spirit that lives in the hot spring, and I desperately need your help to dig further! Apparently, the people of the Old Kingdom used to give offerings to this "Spirit of the Spring" and sometimes received blessings in return.^^I thought it might be nice to have a festival to try it out for ourselves! I promise it'll be fun and not just a boring sciencey research time. Bring an offering -- something valuable, ideally!^^Zed
Just a quick reminder to everyone: PLEASE do not damage the rocks and trees in town.^^If you are in need of materials, there are plenty to the north of town, or even on the beach.^^Thank you!^-Ofelia

Hola, Alchemist!^^Rowan has told me that you are pairing us up with Spirits, and that I am your first client! How exciting!^^I am seeking a Spirit that is some kind of wooden creature. I have seen illustrations of this Spirit in Cleo's books. Its name is something like... Okay? Oakley? Oaktopher? I forget.^^Do not worry, I will not turn him into a chair! He will simply represent the embodiment of my craft!^^AdiÃ³s and gracias!^Paolo

Hi Alchemist! It's your favourite Zed here!^^The Springtime Spirit Festival Time (that's what I've been calling it, anyway) is almost here again! We'll be meeting at the hot spring just like last time, and we're all bringing gifts for the Great Spirit. I'm not sure that it liked my gift last year, so I'm going to try something different this time. It's like a multi-year experiment! Yay!^^Anyway, the Festival will be at 20:00 at the hot springs. See you there!^^Zed

Hello, Alchemist!^^I just wanted to write to you because I know you're so busy, but I wanted to say that you're welcome to chat any time.^^I'm fascinated by your work, so I'd love to pick your brains at some point!^^Cleo

How's it going there bud?^^Rowan tells me you're helpin' us find Spirits. I didn't know Alchemists did things like that! It's very sweet of you.^^When I go fishin', I often see fishy Spirits hangin' around the place, and I think they're just lovely. There's a particular one with a snorkel that makes me chuckle every time. I'm after havin' one like that for myself, as a good luck charm!^^Cheers, b'y!^Love, Tobin

QUILL'S BURTHDAY NOTES^^Get Ossono beer and flowers to say sorry for the other day^Ferra wants a fire flower and some new metal for her burthday^Give Giana plants because she likes plants and then she will be nicer^Rowan asked for stuff to help them be brave?????^^IF FOUND PLESE RETURN TO QUILL!!! AND DONT READ ANYTHING EXEPT THIS BIT >:(
Hello, hello, hello. I love Fishbo, yes? A friend, for my Fishbo Junior. Please. I love him. Fishbo. Bring him... to mE... I wiLL Be sO... hAppY...^^waLDO

[color=green]OSSONO'S NEWSLETTER FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NEW IN TOWN, ISSUE 4[/color]^^Hey, Ossono here!^^Are you feeling adventurous? Come by the tavern and try my dish of the day!^^I can't promise they're all incredible, but sometimes it's nice to try new things, right?^xoxo Ossono
I don't even need a Spirit. But Rowan told me I have to, so, I guess, something Poison type. Maybe something with a similar hairstyle to me or something.^^Gaiana

Hi Alchemist!^^Sorry to send you a letter but I wasn't sure if you'd be visiting the Science Center any time soon and this is somewhat urgent.^^I've run out of coffee. If you find any, I would owe you MY LIFE.^^I'm not even exaggerating that much. Please help.^^Zed

Hi! It's Zed!^^This is my official Spirit Requesting Letter. I've had a lot of time to think about it, and, well... I've always had a particular interest in Electric Spirits... especially those that seem like robots of some kind! How did they evolve like that? We genuinely have no idea.^^Let me know if you find one!^Zed
[color=purple]DON'T SPEND ALL YOUR MONY AT THE TAVERN^^SPEND IT AT FERRA'S COOL FORGE^^HANDMADE TOOLS ARE BETTER THAN BEER^^BUT IF YOU BUY MY TOOLS I CAN ALSO BUY MORE BEER[/color]

Hi, Alchemist!^^Thank you so much for agreeing to pair us all up with Spirits. And for using the mail system to do it!^So, when I was a kid, I made friends with a Capacibee that lived in our garden. I never dreamed I could have one of my own...^^And maybe I can make my own mead, too!^^xoxo Ossono

A LETTER FROM THE ALCHEMIST'S GUILD^^FAO all Guild-associated Alchemists:^^Please ensure that your brooms, gliders, and other certified flying equipment is up-to-date and regularly maintained. The Alchemist's Guild is not responsible for any injuries you may sustain due to improper use of flying equipment.^^Thank you.

Hey!!^I can't beleeve it's my turn to get my own Spirit! All I've wanted since I was a kid is a toasty little Fire Spirit to call my own... sumthing soft and huggable!^^Thank you for doing this for everyone! It's so cool!!!!^^xX_Quill_Xx
Visit Gaiana and Ofelia's Conservatory for all your horticultural needs.^^Or don't. Whatever.

HAVE YOU SEEN A BEARDINI?????? THEIR SO CUTE.^^Please please please can I have a Beardini? Rowan said your helping peeple get Spirits and I want one so bad I might DIE ok^^oh yeah its Ferra by the way!!!! ok bye

Please disregard yesterday's promotional mailout! Our herbalist decided that the best way to protest having to make marketing materials was to do a bad job on purpose.^^Gaiana has been put on fertilizer duty for the foreseeable future!^^-Ofelia

Dear Alchemist,^^Rowan tells me it is my turn to ask for a Spirit of my own. It was hard to decide which one. I have spent my entire life studying the past... but I have always had a fascination with wolves, and with Dark Spirits, since they are the only ones that entered our world through the rifts. Is there anything like that? I have not delved too deeply into the world of Dark Spirit research, since it is so new...^^Yours,^Cleo
Visit Gaiana and Ofelia's Conservatory for all your horticultural needs.^^It is a nice place and I'm sorry for being mean.

Hello, dear Alchemist!^^My mother used to tell me that Ice Spirits were lucky, and I believe her! But also... having an Ice Spirit would remind me of her, too. I don't mind which one! I trust your taste on the matter.^^Thank you!^-Ofelia

Heyyy, what's up?^^I bought a bunch of stamps from Rowan and now I have to write, like, fifty letters to use them all up. We don't even have fifty people in town! What am I supposed to write about?!^^Anyway, I hope you're having a good day. This message will self-destruct.^^...Just kidding.^xoxo Ossono

Thank you so much for helping me pair everyone in town with their perfect Spirit companion.^^I wanted to wait until everyone had a chance to ask you for a Spirit before I took part, but the truth is... I don't mind which Spirit I get paired with. I think, if it's okay, I want YOU to pick one for me.^^Rowan

The Great Spirit was somewhat pleased with our offerings. It left something small behind at the hot spring... We already took what we wanted, so we left everything else in the community chest at Rowan's shop!^^Cleo

Hey kid!^^Hello from your old man - do you still remember me? Ha ha.^Hope your Spirit is taking good care of you! And I hope you're being sensible with your Alchemist wages! Don't spend it all at once!^Your mom and I made fresh pasta last night for a dinner party with some friends in the city. Next weekend we're going to a spa!^Love, Dad

Hey, Alchemist!^^Thank you so much for providing us all with Spirits. But I've been feeling kinda worried about all these Spirits not getting to run free in the outdoors any more... and maybe they miss it, you know? So I was wondering, if you'd ever want to swap our companions out, we could release our old ones back into the wild!^^So, yeah, if you want to change our companion Spirits, just let us know!^^Rowan~

The Great Spirit seemed pleased with our offerings! It left some gifts behind at the hot spring, so we moved them to Rowan's community chest for you... you should take them, as a thank you for your help!^^Cleo

I'm only sending this letter because I'm annoyed at Ossono and this gives her more work to do.^^It's not because I'm trying to help her out with her passion for post, so don't even try to pretend this is a nice gesture.^^-Gaiana.
The Great Spirit seemed over the moon with our offerings! It left some incredible gifts behind at the hot spring, so we moved them to the community chest in Rowan's shop for you! Enjoy!^^Cleo
hi this is waldo^the guy with the chicken house^thank you for being my friend^it means a lot to me

Hi again, Alchemist! It's Zed!^^Thank you for taming a  Spirit for me to study. It turns out that a Spirit's level correlates to microscopic biological changes in its body, which... well, I won't bore you with the details, but it's all very cool and interesting.^^I asked Paolo to draw up some blueprints for a Spirit Barn that you can use. It's a place to keep and raise your Spirits, so you can tame more than three of them! You'll also be able to craft Spirit Nests and Stalls to hatch them and feed them. You can find the recipe in your Moonstone Enchanter!

[color=green]OSSONO'S NEWSLETTER FOR PEOPLE WHO ARE NEW IN TOWN, ISSUE 5[/color]^^It's been a while since the last newsletter!! I am so sorry. It's been really busy here since our Alchemist came to town!^^This newsletter is just to say: Don't forget to support local business! And not just the tavern, I promise. Don't come for me, Ofelia.^xoxo Ossono

Hi Alchemist! Zed here.^^I was just checking over the research you turned in. You've already discovered 10 Spirits! This is fantastic news for my research!^^As a thank you, here is a gift that may help you with your Spirit hunting. These Spirit Lenses let you see a Spirit's level above their head. Have fun!^^If you have time, come to the Science Center and I'll give you another research task!

Dear Alchemist,^^Every year, around this time, a most majestic meteor shower occurs, and we all gather on the beach to witness it. Occasionally, there are even migrating Spirits that parade across the full moon -- it is quite spectacular! If you would like to participate, just join us all at the beach to hang out, chat, and perhaps even wish upon a star, if you believe in that sort of thing.^^See you there!^Best regards,^Cleo
[color=purple]WATS UP GUYS. WELCOME TO FERRA'S NEWSLETER^^THIS WEEK IN THE NEWS: FERRA STARTED A NEWSLETTER^^THATS ALL FOR THIS WEEK TUNE IN NEXT WEEK TO FIND OUT MORE[/color]

Thanks for finding a Psychic Spirit, Alchemist! These little guys are exceptionally fascinating. Did you know that they have a unique gland on their foreheads that allows them to secrete... no, never mind, too gross to put all of that in a letter. Just accept my thanks, and this Moonstone Detector! I got it in a cereal packet. It's a little blue ring that you put on your compass, and it's supposed to glow in the presence of a Moonstone... but I've never found any.^^-Zed^^P.S. come to the Science Center for another task!

Dear Alchemist,^^Don't forget that the meteor shower is on Sunday! We'll all be at the beach. Hopefully, we'll get to witness the mysterious migration of the Spirits, too! Oh, and you don't have to bring anything to this one. Except your sense of wonder, I suppose!^^Cleo
This is a public service announcement that Ferra has been banned from sending letters. Pro tip: don't make fun of the people who manage the mail system!^^xoxo Ossono

Hey Alchemist! It's Zed.^^Ossono told me you recently hatched your own baby Spirit! Congrats! You're basically a parent now.^^You'll need this - it's a stall for feeding your Spirits, but it never needs refilling. Magic, huh?^^P.S. you know the drill - more tasks, Science Center
HELLO EVERYONE THIS IS FERRA^^OSSONO SAID I HAVE TO SAY SORRY FOR BEING A PUBLIC NUSANCE^^IM ONLY DOING THIS SO SHE WILL LET ME BACK IN THE TAVERN

Alchemist! Did you seriously take on a Dark Spirit all on your own? Incredible. I know I asked you to do it, but I was worried it was too dangerous!^^This is for you - it's a crafting recipe for a Spirit Brush. Use it to keep your Spirits happy. And fluffy.^^Zed^^P.S. Science Center, more tasks, etc.

How's it going, alchemist?^^I find it a bit hard to say nice things to people's face, so I'm putting it in a letter. Sorry for being awkward!^^But I just wanted to say that you're really good for the island. Everyone's been so much happier since you came along.^^Also, should I write letters in my accent? I don't write letters much but it feels like it's not really getting my voice across properly.^^Well, thanks for everything!^Tobin (the fisherman)

YOUUUUU DID IIIIIIIT^^You found EVERY SINGLE SPIRIT that exists on these islands! I'm pretty sure no other Alchemist has ever managed that in such a short time.^^I know all my other gifts have been work-related, but this time I wanted to share something more personal, because I feel like we've really gotten to know each other... and I trust you, Alchemist. Even with something very precious and special to me. So please: take this, with my eternal thanks.^^Zed
HELLO ALKEMIST. ITS FERRA!!!!!!^^DO YOU HAVE ANY SPARE ORE OR INGOTS^^I'LL BUY THEM OFF YOU IF YOU WANT^^IM BORED COME SAY HI
hi again^it's waldo^fishbo junior says hi as well^i hope you come by the chicken house some time^bye
Has anyone seen my paintbrush? I dropped it in the river so it probably fell off the island but I thought maybe someone might have seen it.^^xX_Quill_Xx

Hi, Alchemist. Zed here, with a very important request for you!^^I'm doing some experiments that require Spirit Resources. These are rare and valuable materials dropped by Spirits when they trust someone. If you raise Spirits in a barn, feed them and care for them, they should provide you with these materials... and then you can bring them to me, if you have any spare! I'll make it worth your while, of course.^^Zed
Hi! Just a reminder! The postal service is not a bulletin board!! Thanks^xoxo Ossono

Hi sweetheart!^^You probably already know this, but it's been almost a year that you've been away from home. That means your alchemist training is almost over!^And remember: You don't have to leave. You can stay where you are, if you've found a home you want to keep. Or... maybe there's someone that makes you want to stay?^^If you do end up settling down, we'd love to meet them, too!^^Love, Mom

Hiiii! Ossono here!^^So, I was sorting out the Tavern storage the other day, and I found this old cookbook. I mean, it smells old. And it's dusty. And half the pages are torn, or wet, or just... sticky? I'm not sure. But I thought, hey, you know who might like this? THE ALCHEMIST.^^Sooooo... I got Paolo to draft up some blueprints for a Prep Station and a Stove for you! So all you need to do is build those, place the Cookbook in your home, and you can get started! Oh, and if you make any of the recipes in the book, let me know -- you can sell the dish to me at the Tavern and I'll tell you what I think! ^^xoxo Ossono

Hi!!^^I hope you don't mind the premature congratulations on completing your year of training! Also, I would be remiss not to let you know that we don't want to lose you.^Sure, a city might have restaurants and cinemas and bingo halls, or whatever else, but we have each other. You're one of us now, and we'd be sad to see you go. ^Cleo

Dear Alchemist,^^I just wanted to let you know that I have sent a letter of recommendation to the Alchemist's Guild on your behalf - I hope this is not too forward, but if I can help in any way, I will gladly do it. You have been a great help to all of us, and we would be honoured if you would choose to stay on Moonstone Island.^^Sincerely,^Zed

Dear Alchemist,^^Thank you for attending the meteor festival! Isn't it incredible to see the Spirits in their nocturnal flight? I have fantastic news for you, too: all the wishing we did last night seems to have littered the beach with moonstones. We collected them all up and put them in the community chest in Rowan's shop! You should take them all before Quill tries to turn them into paint. I think I also saw Waldo trying to nibble one. Hurry!^^Best regards,^Cleo

Hello darling,^^Zed tells me you might be thinking of leaving once your training is over.^^I won't beg you to stay, but we really need someone like you. And I've grown attached to you! Don't break an old woman's heart!!!!^^Love, Ofelia x
[color=red]SPRING SEED HARVEST IS NOW OPEN![/color]^^Happy Spring, everyone! If you find any exotic seeds, bring them to the Conservatory!^^Sincerely,^Your local Botanist & Herbalist

Alchemist! I have amazing news!^^I was feeling so inspired after seeing the Meteor Shower that I stayed up ALL NIGHT inventing stuff. Most of it was bad, like a toothbrush mitten so you could clean your teeth with your hands... but I did invent one really useful thing, so I thought I'd send the blueprints to you. It's a recycler! You can use it to break crafted items down into their component materials! Yay, recycling!!!^^Zed^^P.S. Unless you think the toothbrush mitten is a good idea too
If you leave Moonstone Island I'll never forgive you. The rest of them might be nice about it but I won't. Just... don't go.^^Gaiana
[color=red]SUMMER SEED HARVEST IS NOW OPEN![/color]^^Happy Summer, everyone! If you find any exotic seeds, bring them to the Conservatory!^^Sincerely,^Your local Botanist & Herbalist
A LETTER FROM THE ALCHEMIST'S GUILD^^Dear Alchemist,^^Well done on making it to your final day of alchemy training.^^Your results will be sent to your parental residence.^^Good luck!
[color=red]FALL SEED HARVEST IS NOW OPEN![/color]^^Happy Fall, everyone! If you find any exotic seeds, bring them to the Conservatory!^^Sincerely,^Your local Botanist & Herbalist

Good morning, Alchemist! Well, I guess I'm assuming you're reading this in the morning.^^Great news: The famous food critic Zafaran is coming to town to check out the local cuisine! Can you believe it??? We're all going to try cooking our best dishes, and then we're going to bring them to the town square to try to dazzle her with our food. Maybe she'll even pick a winner! I know you've been getting into cooking, so you should bring something too.^^Ossono xoxo^^P.S. I'm gonna win!!!
HAPPY ANNIVERSARY!!!^^You've been here a WHOLE YEAR, which means your training is over! You did it!^^Come to the tavern for a celebratory drink!^^xoxo Ossono
[color=red]WINTER SEED HARVEST IS NOW OPEN![/color]^^Happy Winter, everyone! If you find any exotic seeds, bring them to the Conservatory!^^Sincerely,^Your local Botanist & Herbalist

We've added a new menu!^^You can navigate to the Character menu to check your Charms, change your clothes, skin colour and hair colour as well as see your Experience for skills and what active abilities you have augmenting your character at any given time.^^Love,^The Development Team <3

Hello, Alchemist. This is Waldo.^^I don't think I can put into words how grateful I am to you... and how sorry I am to have put you through so much work. You have been nothing but kind, patient, and understanding with me. When I was at my worst, you were always there, on the other side of the chicken house door. You were the light in my darkness.^^After we returned from the Rift, I had a sudden flash of inspiration, which resulted in this invention... and I want you to have it. It's the least I could do. For everything.

Hi, darling!^^I'm hoping you've had a chance to explore the islands a little bit, because Iâve been running behind on orders and I need your help!^^An important part of being an Alchemist is making concoctions, and I can teach you how. You might have found some concoctions already in your adventures - they're often in dungeon chests! Try selling one in your Sell Crate, and then I'll tell you the next step to making your own!^^Kisses, Mom

Hi again, darling!^^We just received the concoction you sold. Unfortunately, it broke in the mail, but that's fine, it was just to see if we could get your friend Ossono to re-route some of your Sell Crate items over to us. And it worked!^^Here's a recipe for an Alchemy Lab so you can make your own concoctions. I'll have more requests for you soon!^^Kisses, Mom

Hello, sweetie!^^Have you set up your Alchemy Lab yet? I hope so, because I'm in need of your help.^^Your father wants to tame a Spirit that's been living under our porch for a while. Could you send me a concoction with -1 vitality, +20 tame, and any amount of Stamina? You'll need to combine two crops with those stats to create it! Just pop it in the Sell Crate when you're done, and Ossono will get it to me.^^Thanks, Mom

Hello again, sweetie!^^Great job on that potion - was it your first time making one? This time, it didn't break in the mail! We asked Ossono to write "FRAGILE" on it, and that seemed to work.^^Anyway, here's a recipe for a cauldron! You can use this to make potions with useful effects, or just to bring a sort of witchy vibe to your interior decor.^^Thanks, Mom

Hi, poppet!^^Your father's birthday is coming up, and I'd love to give him an Abundance Potion... But I can't make one myself, because it'll ruin the surprise! Can you craft one for me and put it in your Sell Crate? Ossono will make sure it gets to me. I've got something for you in return - it's something your father made, and he'd love for you to have it!^^Love you, Mom

Hey! So... I don't know how to put this delicately, but... the dish you submitted was reaaaally bad. Zafaran actually refused to eat it. Yikes. Just a tip for next time: don't submit something super gross, or burnt, or whatever!^^See you next year though? I left a little "sorry you're terrible at cooking" consolation prize in Rowan's Community Chest, just so there are no hard feelings!^^Ossono xoxo

Hi again, poppet!^^Your father's birthday gift was a HUGE SUCCESS. He used the Abundance Potion when he was clearing the yard, and now we have enough firewood for... maybe forever?!^^As a thank you, I've attached your father's Compost Bin crafting recipe to this letter. It's his own invention! You can use it to make all sorts of stat-boosting fertilizers for your crops!^^Love you, Mom

Heyyyyy. Sorry you didn't win, but it was a really tough competition this year. For the record, I really liked your dish! It was a really interesting combination of flavours. I might have to steal the idea for the tavern!^^Anyway, don't be put off. I put a little consolation prize in Rowan's Community Chest, so not all is lost! You should come back next year, too!^^Ossono xoxo

Hello, pumpkin!^^I have a bit of a puzzle for you. Your father and I have a bet going. I told him that it's possible to create a concoction with 12 Power, but no other stat boosts or debuffs, but he says it's impossible!^^Please help me prove him wrong. I'll give you one of my recipes in return. Oh, and just put the finished concoction in the Sell Crate when it's ready.^^Love, Mom

Heyyyyy!!! Congratulations, Head Chef!^^I promise I'm not super bitter about losing to you. Only a LITTLE bit bitter, haha. You totally earned it -- that dish was amazing. Where did you come up with an idea like that? Maybe you can tell me over a pint some time. Oh, right, and there's a prize for you in Rowan's Community Chest!^^I hope you come back to the festival this time next year! It was cool to have new blood!^^Ossono xoxo

Hello again, pumpkin!^^Thank you once again for helping me out, but also for helping me prove your father wrong. I won the bet, and now he has to mow the lawn for the next month.^^I'm sending you a new recipe with this letter - it's for a Luck Potion, which was the very last potion I learned how to make as an Alchemist-in-training. It's very close to my heart!^^Love, Mom

Hi, sweetheart!^^One last concoction test for you, my dear! When I was a student, these two recipes were the ones it took me longest to figure out. One is the Luck Potion (I sent you the recipe for it!), and the other one is a concoction with EXACTLY 50 Tame, 30 Stamina, and no other stat buffs. Now, don't be too disheartened if you don't get it right the first time... but I believe in you! Just put it in the Sell Crate when you've figured it out, okay?^^Best of luck, Mom
